title: Highest degree of skillshot
body: Which Champ do you feel has the highest skill cap based on skill shots/skill shot combos?

replies.body:
Brand but only against high elo players noobs and weak player are just food. To land a full 3 spell combo you will have to be in range of theirs and auto attacks as well. you screw up you will be cc'ed and ingibed alot. Very little room for error that close.


My second pick would be Urgot without landing his W but no one care about him anyway lol.

None really.
But compared champ to champ,it's probably Gragas
